name: Five Nights at Freddy's - Shitty Edition
name_original: Five Nights at Freddy's - Shitty Edition
description: Welcome to your new winter job at Freddy Fazbender's Pizza, where kids and parents alike come for entertainment and pizza! The main attraction is Freddy Fazbender's, of course; and his four friends. They are animatronic robots, programmed to pleasure the crowds!
